title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, high-performance developer portfolio showcasing full-stack projects and UI/UX work. Built using React 19 and TailwindCSS, with Three.js and Framer Motion integrated for immersive 3D visuals and smooth animations. title: HiRevo :- AI Interviewer Platform
description: An AI-powered interview platform that simulates real technical interviews using LLM-based evaluation. Includes role-based authentication, dynamic question generation, answer analysis, real-time scoring, and detailed interview feedback. Designed to help students and professionals practice interviews with an interactive and intelligent system.
